title: kaNDaavuDan uLLam
sahitya:
kaNdavudan uLLam koLLai pOgudhE
kaarmugil maNivaNNaa  paar pugazh mOhanaa - unaik  [kaNdavudan]
anupallavi

koNdal niRa vaNNaa kuvalayam aaLum unai
vaNduNu malar sOlai vaan nagaril        
[kaNdavudan]
caraNam

thingaL thiru mugaththil thEnE malarum kaNgaL
mangaLamaai ilangida malar magal thirumaarbil
vanga maa kadal kadaintha vaanagaraa viNNagaraa
engu nOkkinum un inbamaya jOthiyaik      
[kaNdavudan]
